name: MedicationStatementStatusCodes
title: MedicationStatement Status Codes
description: Cross-version difference of MedicationStatement Status Codes
purpose: R5 http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-statement-status is broader than R4 http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-statement-status and requires mapping choices for conversion.

extension.valueString: R5 `recorded` maps to multiple concepts in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-statement-status.
